title: Fipolio
description: Developed a MERN stack web app for portfolio and financial management with REST API. Utilized CI/CD pipeline with Jenkins for automated Docker image builds, facilitating AWS deployment. Demonstrated full-stack skills and expertise in DevOps methodologies, ensuring seamless web application creation and deployment.
